features.title: Our Values
features.subtitle: Pursuing the balance between technology and emotion

emotion.title: Emotion Understanding
emotion.description: AI-powered emotion analysis creates interfaces that understand and empathize with users.

dx.title: Developer Experience
dx.description: Intuitive APIs and rich documentation help developers start quickly and scale easily.

global.title: Global Support
global.description: Designed for multilingual environments to provide optimal experiences for users worldwide.

sumDiary.title: Sum Diary
sumDiary.description: A smart diary service where AI analyzes and understands your emotions. Record your daily emotions and discover patterns.

huaUx.title: HUA UX Framework
huaUx.description: A React framework with UI + Motion + i18n pre-wired. Build beautiful UX quickly.

cta.title: Let's Build Together
cta.description: Join HUA Labs in building the future of emotion-aware interfaces. Contact us anytime with questions.
